enb_long_title: United Nations Climate Change Conference - Bali
sentences: Co-Chair Hojesky introduced draft text on capacity building for developing countries.
Tanzania, for the G-77/CHINA, said the text should take the form of a COP/MOP decision.
Sweden, for the EU, favored an SBI conclusion rather than a COP/MOP decision.
Delegates also considered the draft paragraph-by-paragraph.
